abstract: Islamic State abducts about 900 Kurdish civilians in Syrian province of Aleppo over period of three weeks amid Syrian forces' effort to retake militant stronghold of Al Bab.
lead_paragraph: The militants and Syrian Kurdish forces have been fiercely battling over the nearby town of Manbij for weeks.

headline.main: ISIS Said to Abduct Hundreds of Kurdish Civilians in Syria
headline.print_headline: ISIS Is Blamed in Mass Abductions in Syria

snippet: The militants and Syrian Kurdish forces have been fiercely battling over the nearby town of Manbij for weeks.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
